backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, resumes, coaching suggestions, and access control with CRUD operations and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high‑level features to relevant source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global OKLCH color variables, themes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, authentication, profile setup handling, and page layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for collecting and saving a user's name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/coaching/Suggest: UI component that groups and displays coaching suggestions by section with category badges and icons.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorStat: Reusable component showing an error alert with an optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/common/FormError: Displays a destructive alert listing form validation errors when present.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSt: Shows a centered loading spinner with an optional status message.
frontend/src/components/resume/ExportBut: Button that triggers browser print to export the resume as a PDF.
frontend/src/components/resume/ResumeLis: Renders a resume card with actions to edit, preview, coach, duplicate, or delete a resume.
frontend/src/components/resume/ResumePre: Generates a styled resume preview from deserialized resume data, displaying all major sections.
frontend/src/components/resume/SectionBa: Form section for editing basic contact information such as name, email, phone, location, and website.
frontend/src/components/resume/SectionEd: Manages a list of education entries with add, remove, edit, reorder, and expansion controls.
frontend/src/components/resume/SectionEx: Manages a list of work experience entries with add, remove, edit, reorder, and expansion controls.
frontend/src/components/resume/SectionSk: Allows adding, removing, and displaying skills as badges with input validation and tips.
frontend/src/components/resume/SectionSu: Renders a resume summary input card with character counting and a tip alert.
frontend/src/components/resume/serialize: Serializes and deserializes resume form data into backend section formats using custom delimiters.
frontend/src/components/shell/AppShell.t: Layout shell providing header, footer, navigation, and logout handling based on user identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCoaching.ts: Provides hooks to fetch resume coaching data and trigger coaching runs via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, and logout through an auth client provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useResumes.ts: Offers CRUD hooks for resumes using the backend actor with query invalidation for consistency.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for themes, and print-specific styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CoachingPage.tsx: Displays AI coaching results for a resume, with options to run or re-run analysis and view suggestions.
frontend/src/pages/ResumeEditorPage.tsx: Provides a full resume editing interface with validation, saving, and navigation to preview or coaching.
frontend/src/pages/ResumeListPage.tsx: Shows the user’s list of resumes and allows creation of new resumes with default sections.
frontend/src/pages/ResumePreviewPage.tsx: Loads and displays a read‑only resume preview with export functionality.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and new feature requests for a resume builder with AI coaching. Includes image requirements and tracks architectural notes, issues, and versioning.
